user.description: Please enter username and password that you use to connect with the selected Midea mobile application.
user.title: Sign-in with Midea app account

data.use_cloud: Use cloud API to poll devices

advanced_settings.description:
You can provide specific Midea mobile app key and app id if the default ones don't work.

You can also specify network address (e.g. 192.0.1.2) or range (e.g. 192.0.3.4/24) to search for specific appliance(s) if regular discovery doesn't work.
advanced_settings.title: Advanced settings

data.name: Device name
data.use_cloud: Use cloud API to poll this device

unreachable_appliance.description:
We were unable to discover an appliance called {name} with the id {id} on the local network.

If you know appliance's IPv4 address, please enter it below to add it to Home Assistant.

You can also provide token and key if you have them. If not, we will obtain them from Midea cloud.
unreachable_appliance.title: Appliance IPv4 address is missing

reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]
reauth_confirm.description: The Midea dehumidifier (LAN) integration needs to re-authenticate your account

error.invalid_app_name: Unsupported application name ({cause}). See log for more information.
error.invalid_appkey: Please provide Midea mobile app key and app id
error.invalid_ip_address: Invalid IPv4 address ({cause}), please enter a valid IPv4 address (e.g. 192.0.1.2)
error.invalid_ip_range: Invalid IPv4 network address or network range ({cause}). Expected formats are 192.0.1.2 or 192.0.3.4/24
error.invalid_state: Unexpected state of configuration flow. See log for more information.
error.no_cloud: Unable to connect to Midea cloud API
error.not_discovered: Unable to find appliance at specified IPv4 address.
error.unknown: An unknown error has occurred. See log for more information.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Already defined a Midea app account. Only a single account is supported for Midea dehumidifier (LAN).
